M

main(String[]) - Static method in class JEST.Main
This class is one of the most important : it is the one that truly launches the game and allows the player to use the console.
Main - Class in JEST
The class allows the game to run and the player to use the console.

makeOffer(Card, Card) - Method in class JEST.Player
The REAL player makes his offer : it retrieves 2 OfferCards (a face-up or face down card) and creates the player's offer.
